mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspGodPrmThrgh Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ GOD_NO , PRM_NO , IMDTL_DC_YN FROM DSP_GOD_PRM_THRGH WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspGodPrmThrgh Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_GOD_PRM_THRGH WHERE 1 = 1
